title: What The Board Needs To Know

This week features artificial intelligence chatbot provider OpenAI being banned by the Italian privacy regulator; cybersecurity leaders struggling to find employees they can afford, as sought-after job seekers are raising their salary demands; and news that some cybercriminals are moving away from ransomware toward less complex attacks, for which many businesses may be unprepared.
